author: Rob Polynin
comment: This is a great concept, however it sucks the life out of my battery.  Lost 15% battery life in 15 mins.  Please fix this as I payed for the app and would like to use it.  Also, I keep getting a notification to sync watch face to Android wear, but it already is...and this is the only face that does this.  When both these issues are fixed, I'd be glad to change my rating to 5 stars.
title: Sucks the life out of my battery.
